detail_desc: Short-sleeved playsuit in soft jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a wrapover top and horizontal ties at the back. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hems.

Short-sleeved playsuit in soft jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a wrapover top and horizontal ties at the back. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hems.

Short-sleeved playsuit in soft jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a wrapover top and horizontal ties at the back. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hems.

Oversized biker jacket in imitation leather with a faux shearling lining and large, faux shearling-lined notch lapels. Diagonal zip down the front and a detachable belt at the hem. Faux shearling trims at the cuffs and hem.

Oversized biker jacket in imitation leather with a faux shearling lining and large, faux shearling-lined notch lapels. Diagonal zip down the front and a detachable belt at the hem. Faux shearling trims at the cuffs and hem.
Double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and diagonal welt pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and diagonal welt pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and diagonal welt pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Short coat in felted fabric containing some recycled wool with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Short coat in felted fabric containing some recycled wool with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Short coat in felted fabric containing some recycled wool with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Short coat in felted fabric containing some recycled wool with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.

Jacket in a soft weave with a concealed double-breasted press-stud fastening at the front. Hood with a detachable faux fur trim, pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined in a recycled polyester weave.

Jacket in a soft weave with a concealed double-breasted press-stud fastening at the front. Hood with a detachable faux fur trim, pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined in a recycled polyester weave.

Jacket in a soft weave with a concealed double-breasted press-stud fastening at the front. Hood with a detachable faux fur trim, pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined in a recycled polyester weave.

Short parka with a faux shearling-lined hood, high collar with a tab and press-stud and a concealed zip down the front. Handwarmer pockets at the top and patch front pockets with a flap, hook and loop fastening and an opening at the sides. Sleeves with a tab and press-stud at the cuffs, one sleeve with a pocket that has a flap and hook and loop fastening. Drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Short parka with a faux shearling-lined hood, high collar with a tab and press-stud and a concealed zip down the front. Handwarmer pockets at the top and patch front pockets with a flap, hook and loop fastening and an opening at the sides. Sleeves with a tab and press-stud at the cuffs, one sleeve with a pocket that has a flap and hook and loop fastening. Drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.

Short, A-line dress in sturdy cotton denim with a V-neck opening at the front and ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist and hips. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a slight shimmer. Double flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lined. Matching, elasticated hairband with a bow.
Sandals in imitation leather. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Sandals in imitation leather. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Shimmering metallic sandals with braided jute trims around the soles and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings, cotton insoles and textured soles.

Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the top edge. Elastic strap over the foot, a decorative bow at the front and small loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Height of soles 0.4 cm.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.

Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather. Narrow, crossover foot straps with a decorative spotted tulle flower on top, and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Heel caps with a lightly padded edge, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.

Trousers in an airy weave, one pair made of cotton chambray and the other of viscose. Elastication and a twisted drawstring at the waist, side pockets and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.

Set with a blouse, pair of trousers and a hairband in a patterned cotton weave. Blouse with butterfly sleeves and buttons down the front. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems. Hairband with a twisted detail at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Leggings in jersey with a washed look. Elasticated waist and pin-tucks on the legs.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Dress with buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Leggings in patterned jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
A-line skirt in imitation leather with elastication at the back of the waist, a press-stud at the front and a fake fly. Decorative diagonal front pockets with a zip. Unlined.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Partly lined.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Partly lined.
Short twisted metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and pair of culottes in airy cotton voile. Top with a frill-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Culottes with covered elastication at the waist and wide, calf-length legs.

Pyjamas with a cami top and pair of calf-length bottoms in softly draping satin. Top with a deep, drawstring neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Bottoms with a regular waist with covered elastication, a small frill trim at the top and wide, straight legs.
Large wash bag in soft, transparent plastic with an opening at the top and a chunky zip. Size approx. 9x18x32 cm.
Two-strand metal necklace. One of the chains is decorated with pearly plastic beads and one has small pendants. Adjustable length 41-49 cm.
Metal earrings and studs in various designs. The zinc and plastic content of the earrings is recycled. Size from 0.2 cm to 1.5 cm.

Short, straight-cut dress in washed, lightweight denim with a round neckline, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with a flounced trim. Embroidered, scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Two pairs decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter from approx. 1.5 cm to 3 cm.

Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with a sculpting effect on the waist. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Sewn-on belt with a decorative buckle to define the waist, and medium coverage at the back.
Short, fitted one-shoulder dress in glittery jersey with one long sleeve.

Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist and lined gusset.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist and lined gusset.
Short, fitted dress in soft satin. Draped neckline at the front, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

Short, A-line dress in a patterned viscose weave. Wide neckline with wide smocking and short, wide sleeves. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Cropped, double-layered sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a cut-out section on one shoulder. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Cropped, double-layered sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a cut-out section on one shoulder. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Super-flared skirt in a crisp cotton weave with a wide, sewn-on tie belt at the waist, pleats at the top, side pockets and concealed buttons down the front. Unlined.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery motif on the front and gathered frills over the shoulders.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery motif on the front and gathered frills over the shoulders.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery motif on the front and gathered frills over the shoulders.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery motif on the front and gathered frills over the shoulders.
Shorts in soft jersey with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and frills down the sides.
Shorts in soft jersey with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and frills down the sides.
Shorts in soft jersey with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and frills down the sides.
Top in ribbed cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and decorative flounces with overlocked edges down the shoulder seams.
Top in ribbed cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and decorative flounces with overlocked edges down the shoulder seams.

Long-sleeved dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front and reversible sequins down the sleeves (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Round, ribbed neckline and ribbing at the cuffs.
Body in ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch and one shoulder strap with a cut-out section.
Body in ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch and one shoulder strap with a cut-out section.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.

Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with embroidery and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons, a seam at the waist with elastication and an open section at the back, and a peplum. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with embroidery and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons, a seam at the waist with elastication and an open section at the back, and a peplum. Unlined.

Biker jacket in soft, supple leather with fixed shoulder tabs and wide notch lapels with decorative metal press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Zipped front pocket, discreet pockets in the side seams and a fake coin pocket with a flap and press-stud at the front. Fixed belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
